channel.title: Need some models help

item.title: Need some models help
item.dc:creator: @Gravity_pk Gravity pk
item.description:
@Gravity_pk wrote:

my tokhaar-kal is glitched so u can see it through ur body. when i use the fix and edit the model.java it glitches alot more items like dharoks and void etc… anyone know how i can just fix it and have everything working? when i fixed the cape it also fixed my pernix. this is the code i currently have. im using 317 pi source

public Model(int modelId) {
	byte[] is = aClass21Array1661[modelId].aByteArray368;
	if (is[is.length - 1] == -1 && is[is.length - 2] == -1)
		read622Model(is, modelId);
	else
		readOldModel(modelId);
	if (newmodel[modelId]) {
		scale2(4);// 2 is too big -- 3 is almost right
	}
}

This is the 1 that fixed it (but glitched other items)

public Model(int modelId) {
byte[] is = aClass21Array1661[modelId].aByteArray368;
if (is[is.length - 1] == -1 && is[is.length - 2] == -1)
read622Model(is, modelId);
else
readOldModel(modelId);
if (newmodel[modelId]) {
scale2(4);// 2 is too big – 3 is almost right
if(anIntArray1638 != null) {
for(int j = 0; j < anIntArray1638.length; j++)
anIntArray1638[j] = 10;
}
}
}

Read full topic
